Comment: This response effectively expands on the answer provided by delving into the significance of the sending of the apostles by Jesus from a culturally retributive perspective. It demonstrates a thorough understanding of the role of apostleship in the context of the Great Commission by highlighting the empowerment, validation, and sacred responsibility bestowed upon the apostles by Jesus. The Christian worldview is effectively applied to analyze the spiritual significance of the apostles being sent out to spread the gospel. Great job in providing a comprehensive and insightful response.
